hesml.benchmarks.impl

Class WordNetSimBenchmark

  • java.lang.Object
    • hesml.benchmarks.impl.AbstractBenchmark
      • hesml.benchmarks.impl.WordNetSimBenchmark
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimilarityBenchmark
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BenchmarkCrossCorpusICModelMeasures, BenchmarkCrossCorpusICModels, BenchmarkCrossICModelMeasures, BenchmarkMultipleDatasets, BenchmarkNonICMultiMeasures, BenchmarkSingleICmeasure, BenchmarkSingleNonICMeasure, BenchmarkSynsetsInfo

    abstract class WordNetSimBenchmark
extends AbstractBenchmark
    This class implements the common functions for all the word similarity benchmarks based on WordNet.
    Author:
    Juan Lastra-Díaz
